queries.CPcoordinates: SELECT DISTINCT(?institute) ?instituteLabel ?lat ?long WHERE {?CP a ?o; a-loc:hasCulturalInstituteOrSite ?institute. ?institute rdfs:label ?instituteLabel. ?CP clvapit:hasGeometry ?geometry. ?geometry a-loc:hasCoordinates ?coordinates. ?coordinates a-loc:lat ?lat. ?coordinates a-loc:long ?long. }
queries.CPInterval: SELECT DISTINCT(?CP) ?interval WHERE { ?CP a ?o; a-loc:hasCulturalInstituteOrSite ?institute clvapit:hasGeometry ?geometry; a-cd:hasDating ?obj. ?obj a-cd:hasDatingEvent ?event. ?event a-cd:specificTime ?timeInterval. ?timeInterval rdfs:label ?interval}
